website_summaries.verdict: A figure-flattering jacket that resists water, maintains warmth and is designed by a revered brand that understands weather well.
pros: Functions both as active wear and is even structured well enough to wear to work for some
Customers love the fit and for a variety of sizes
Works well on its own in cold, windy conditions without having to bulk up underneath
cons: A perfect jacket for lightweight workouts in the fall and winter, but may be a bit to warm for full endurance sports

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jacket. I tried on a large at a local store which was slightly too big, so I ordered a medium and it fits so well. I'm 5'9" and 145lbs. The sleeves are sufficiently long and the jacket hits just below my hips, which is a great fit. The smooth outer surface repels water, keeps wind out, and repels pet hair. Medium warmth, I walk outside in the cool weather in this, and I wear it at work when the heat isn't high enough. It's professional in appearance. I hope they keep making these coats because I love it and would buy more in the future. Lots of color options too!
customer_reviews.author: olympicdreamer

customer_reviews.title: I love this coat
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. Form fitting without being to tight. The perfect weight for a variety of weather. And miracle of miracles the sleeves are the perfect length. I have a really hard time with coats because my shoulders are broad and my arms are long but the sleeves were designed a bit longer and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight jacket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large ( I'm a size 12, 38DD) can be worn over a Tshirt or anything equally lightweight, but not over anything bulky. I live in the desert so heavy bulk is not what I want. If you plan on wearing many layers or a sweater underneath you will need to up the size. The mine shaft color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly clark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jacket. Very windproof, and sheds water well. Has a good medium range use from about 35-65 degrees. Love it, and will probably add a few colors since the price is substantially less than retail in my area. Feels like a solid product, no noticeable blemishes or irregularities, clean, and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Love the purple color
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's Large/14. This is defintely a more fitted type jacket. This is a bit snug in the bust on me (36 DDD) but okay everywhere else. If I was going to layer underneath I would have returned for an XL but I live in the SF Bay area, it doesn't get that cold so this with a t shirt underneath is going to suffice for 95% of the winter weather here. Love the purple color. I did not find the sleeves freakishly long as others have but they do come a touch past my wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: Do your arms hang low?
customer_reviews.text: Even though other reviewers mentioned the long sleeves, I thought they couldn't be that bad and ordered the jacket. Oh, my gosh. The sleeves are ridiculously long! Granted, I ordered an XL (I'm short but round) and XL sleeves are always longer (do heavier people have longer arms?), but these sleeves hang down about two inches past my middle fingertip. I'm going to keep the jacket and have the sleeves shortened, but it's something worth noting. If you don't want to have the sleeves altered, you might want to go elsewhere for a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Gloaming

customer_reviews.title: The material is good quality and the fit is otherwise perfect except the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 6" 175 (size 12) and typically wear a Large in shirts and most jackets. The material is good quality and the fit is otherwise perfect except the sleeves were too long. The model shown has the sleeve hitting at the wrist/top of the thumb however these hung to almost cover my thumb with my arms at my sides. At this price, I am keeping the jacket and will have it tailored to fit perfectly (shorten 1'1/2").
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Mom's Happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom who loved my doubly expensive Northface jacket (a gift from my sons). I have this Columbia Jacket in purple and showed my mom, who was shocked at the similarities with Northface at half the price. She was thrilled when this was delivered. The quality and sizing are great!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: You're going to want one in every color!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket in several colors. Some for myself and others as gifts. They are AMAZING!! The cut is very flattering and gives the illusion of an hour glass, even on people who weren't blessed with one naturally. The jacket appears to be lightweight but it's actually a heavy material that is extremely warm. Warm enough for winter weather but without the bulk of an actual cost.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Does run small
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! I have been looking for a windproof jacket and finally found it! My only complaint is other reviews stated it fit too big, so I ordered a Medium. When I tried it on, the sleeves were a little long, not much, and the jacket zipped up until my breasts. If you wear a 36D order one size up, it won't fit over the girls. I plant to exchange for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket except for sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the jacket in Chianti, size large, I am 5'6" and wear 12/14, medium or large depending on item and fit. The jacket was very nice quality and the fit well in the body. However, the sleeves were too long and too wide above the elbow and the shoulder seam was slightly off the shoulder which made the arms look bulky. The sleeves just didn't hang right and there were actually a few folds in them. Although I really liked the jacket the problem with the arms made me immediately return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy G.

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it was too large for what I was looking for. I still liked it, and I hope I can grab the XS next time. I have a Columbia Lite winter jacket (the down kind) and I compared these two for sizing once the Kruser arrived. To my surprise, they are the same size. I think that because the Kruser material isn't form-fitting, it feels and looks large. Sure enough, I put on a sweater, tried the Kruser on, and it works just fine. I still returned it because I wasn't looking for a coat so much as a layer.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Bought as a replacement for the Columbia jacket that I lost and I loved so much. Love the color and the accent zipper color. It fits just right. I'm a size large or extra large usually in tops and a size 14/16 in pants if that helps anyone. I've always loved my Columbia jacket. It's the perfect weight for fall and as it starts to get cold. Did I mention I love this jacket?
customer_reviews.author: MrsKelley

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: 5'7" 145lbs (32C chest, 27 waist, 39 hips), size small fits perfectly. Roomy but not totally without shape. Sleeves would probably be too long if I bought a medium. The jacket itself measures about 38" at the bust, 34" waist, 40" hip. Soft polyester lining, warm in cool weather, but not for northern winters. Would need another layer for spending all day in heavy rain, but sufficiently water resistant for short periods of time. This is the first Columbia jacket I've purchased. I bought it because my boyfriend had a similar softshell that I really liked, and I'm glad I did because the product is well made and one of my favorite jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good quality but this jacket sooooooo large
customer_reviews.text: very good quality but this jacket sooooooo large ,I usu wear S or XS size, I ordered XS but it's still very loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit large
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on buying this without trying it on. Its great quality, but it runs a bit large. Normally I'm an XLarge, but I wish I had bought it Large. The sleeves are too long for my arms and it isnt form fitting. But its warm and comfty for temperatures for 50-60's
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking coat perfect for windy weather
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking coat perfect for windy weather!! Doesn't even feel like you're wearing a coat as it's not bulky at all but still protects you with a Supreme amount of Warmth and protection from the wind and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi M.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! Material is soft and not to thick. I'll be able to wear it underneath a winter jacket. Fits perfect on shoulders and hips. According to the size chart I would need a medium size although I wear small. The medium size was too big. The small size fits perfectly. So I recommend to order the size you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Marion B.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, long sleeves.  Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: As comments have said, the sleeves are way too long - A large is 26 1/2" from shoulder to hem. I'll hem them since I sew. The rest fits fine, fairly true to size. The color is slightly darker plum than the photo. The fabric is not quite what I expected, fleece is inside, smooth on outside but will help with wicking moisture. Seems like it will be nice and warm. Is roomy to layer, somewhat. A tad tight in hips, but it will do.
customer_reviews.author: MDG

customer_reviews.title: Warm but slightly bigger than sized
customer_reviews.text: Kept me warm in 34 degrees morning temp when I walk my dog. The sleeves are way too long, though, and it's a bit large but at least can accommodate an extra layer underneath if I need to toss on an additional sweater. Heads up, though: it is NOT wind-resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Teacher Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great cut and fabric
customer_reviews.text: Love the fabric. It's one piece smooth front with a fleece back - very warm without a lot of bulk. Runs a bit big and the sleeves are very long. The cut is very flattering. It's not at all boxy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very limited to the clothing I can buy on-line as tops and pants run short - this jacket was perfect. I ordered the medium
customer_reviews.text: I am tall (5'9) with long arms and this jacket is a dream. I am very limited to the clothing I can buy on-line as tops and pants run short - this jacket was perfect. I ordered the medium and the arm length is just right. It's also light, warm (spring/fall) and water resistant. I can easily fit a long sleeve T underneath for layered hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. The weight is perfect for most of the year except for the really cold portion of the winter. The fabric allows it to lay nicely. I would go up one size, as it is not a bulky jacket and it then allows you to wear a sweater at certain times of the year comfortably under it.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this in an XL because a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in an XL because a lot of reviews said it ran small. It was way too big when it came in, to the fact that it is in the process of being returned. I will be ordering it in a large. Update: I ordered this again in a large and it fits much much better. It will be perfect for when it starts getting chilly up here in Alaska but it is very soft and I can tell by trying it on it will keep me very warm.
customer_reviews.author: denedra

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sleek jacket. I ordered the mineshaft color and it is kind of a dark grayish with a slight purple tone. More grey though. Very pretty color! I am 5ft2in and 130 lbs. The small fit perfect. I could wear a long sleeve under but definitely not a sweatshirt. The arms are a little long but not too much to be a problem. Overall, a great jacket! And arrived faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful jacket - excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I lucked out on this item - got it in October for $16 on Amazon and knew I had to buy a few before they raised the price or realized it was probably marked incorrectly. Other retailers had it for its true value of $70. The material is excellent and the color is beautiful. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with nice long sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect winter jacket that is roomy enough to layer underneath, yet still keeps a nice figure. The sleeves are extra long and don't move when you stretch your arms out. The only disappointment is that in the past 10 years the microfleece lining on the inside has become thinner than it used to be, but it is still waterproof in light rain.
customer_reviews.author: CJones

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality and feel of it
customer_reviews.text: I expected this jacket to have long sleeves from previous reviews, so I'll be bringing it to a tailor to fit the length. Otherwise this brand is built for athletic lanky people. Love the quality and feel of it. I had another in a different color and it worked very well for blocking some wind and keeping me warm.
customer_reviews.author: breanne behnke

customer_reviews.title: It is good for the fall/spring time of you want a light ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2’’ and weigh 106 lbs. I ordered an XS and it fitted perfectly. It is good for the fall/spring time of you want a light jacket. There is a small lining of fleece inside.
customer_reviews.author: Quynh

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not bulky or heavy! Looks really nice also.
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! Already bought a second in a different color. Not heavy weight but plenty warm. Perfect for our crazy up and down TX weather. 35 going in for work and 65 coming out from work. Stayed plenty warm while standing outside at 32 and windy but didn’t have to carry a big giant coat around all day. Don’t judge..... 32 in Houston = cold. Silly, but true:)
customer_reviews.author: MMC

customer_reviews.title: Small runs big!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket. If you wear American Eagle size xs/s. This Columbia size small will be too big. I would recommend getting an xs. Even with a sweatshirt underneath the shoulders and arm length are a tad too big/long. I am 5'10. 130lbs. I wear A.E..size sm/med. And this jacket fits me perfect! Problem is, I had bought it for my daughter. Lol now I will get her an xs. We will be twinsies! At 15 she's gonna love that:)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Jacket Collar Color Clashed
customer_reviews.text: The fit of the jacket was fine, but the collar clashed with the jacket because is was a different shade of blue. The collar was a purple/blue and the jacket was a blue/gray shade. This jacket was not designed to be a two-tone, and unfortunately, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE LOVE this jacket. i bought it for a trip to China and it did not disappoint. we never had a downpour but it was very damp and drizzly when we were there. this jacket kept me warm and dry and looked nice too. i am 5'10 and the body length and sleeves were long enough too. so short women might find it too long, depending on body type and preference.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is super cute! I got this for my little sister and it fit her perfectly, the color was really great too. I definitely recommend this jacket. ALSO: It's a little on the light side, so you might want to wear a sweater under it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Both to small and too big.
customer_reviews.text: Quality jacket but is slim in the chest area (read anything over an A you might have issues it being too tight) and sleves are very long. Good for those not so cold days and great for colder days to layer on top of sweater or sweatshirt.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fits well
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, this was for my wife and she is happy with it. The sleeves are slightly long but it is okay. Compared to her M H brand, this soft-shell density seems slightly lower (or less weather/waterproof.) and with fleece inside to keep warm. It should be sufficient for normal wear, especially the price is more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: I was so worried on if I took a S ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried on if I took a S or XS. The XS fits perfectly. This runs large. I'm 5'3 and 127 lbs. and took XS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light weight jacket- something for the a summer trip to the mountains of Colorado, as well as the mild winters in central Texas. This fits the bill perfectly. Fitted a bit, but not tight. Lining is very soft, and I appreciate that it is water resistant. Only complaint are that the sleeves are a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Schultz, K

customer_reviews.title: Runs really big.
customer_reviews.text: I'm typically a size small in jackets, so I ordered just that in this one. The sleeves were too long and big and the jacket itself was really big. It might've been designed for someone with good arms and 5'5+ (I have a small built and am 5'0.) Ended up returning it because it did not look good on me. Not as thick as I wanted it to be either.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: A nice, warm jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and she absolutely loves it. The white one is about as white as fresh snow and looks very classy. Wind stands no chance against this jacket as it simply flows around it. In west Texas (where it does get cold) it's great to have a jacket that can keep you warm during the morning, but not bake you during the middle of the day. I'm sure I'll be buying more of these in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good looking jacket
customer_reviews.text: My wife is 5' 0" and a slim build. She normally wears a small for most tops. This small was way too big for her, especially the sleeves. We ordered the extra small and it fit much better. This is a good looking light weight jacket and the wife was happy that I picked this out for her. It does repel a light rain. She didn't really try it out in a heavy rain so I can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color, really is repellent to light rain. ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color, really is repellent to light rain. A bit wide in the belly, but it's ok to use a cardigan or fleece jacket under. Not too warm for cold winter
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Escobar

customer_reviews.title: ... when it was in surplus so it was an EXCELLENT buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this jacket when it was in surplus so it was an EXCELLENT buy!! I got an xs and the arms were a bit more roomy than I expected. But, I like that now because I can layer under the jacket without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the jacket seems good and it's a great price point
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the jacket seems good and it's a great price point. Unfortunately, the sleeves were outrageously long on my 5'5" frame and overall the jacket was far too big/boxy in the bust area. I usually wear a L/XL and the L in this was too big but I imagine the M would be too tight in the hips for me.
customer_reviews.author: MrsTPG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket. I purchased a medium in the Pulse color. I'm 5.5 and 140 lbs. It fit every where but it's a little tight to get on and feels a little tight in the front crease of my arms when I'm moving around. It's not enough discomfort to return it. It's an awfully pretty jacket for fall/spring time.I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Coble

customer_reviews.title: great quality jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! Columbia makes a good quality jacket. I live in Texas and this is enough to wear through the winter. The material makes it so its water resistant and wind resistant. So its not too hot to wear as a light jacket but warm enough when its chilly. Keep in mind I do live in Texas and we don't have too many COLD days. Pockets zip up too which i love!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jacket on Friday and it was delivered on Monday super fast without paying extra. I ordered a medium and it fit perfectly. I love the material and the long sleeves. I love it & will be ordering other colors as well 😁.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie G

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket but over-sized
customer_reviews.text: Jacket in small was over-sized and the sleeve length was about 3" too long. Otherwise, the jacket appeared to be well-constructed and the partial fleece interior would provide sufficient warmth in cool weather. I exchanged the jacket for extra small.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Too Big
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was exactly what I was looking for but unfortunately it was too big. I usually wear a small in jackets, and this fit through the torso fine but the sleeves were too long and big. I ended up having to return it because it didn't look right and ended up buying something at a store. I will probably look at this again the next time I need this type of jacket, but I'll order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket so much, really cuts on wind and water while being very lightweight. My friend admired mine so I got this one for her and she was very satisfied. Best price that I have found. Runs a little large but that is nice so that you can keep on some layers underneath. Very slimming appearance for a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B.

customer_reviews.title: She wears a medium and it fit her perfect. She really liked it
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was for my daughter in law. She wears a medium and it fit her perfect. She really liked it. It was exactly what she was looking for. With help from my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: baggier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The price on this was definitely unbeatable, not sure why the different sizes are different prices. I ended up with a small, which works well in the body, but these arms are huge! Perhaps it's the style, but with the white color, I feel like the michelin man. Overall, the construction was good, just not flattering on me.
customer_reviews.author: Leila McAllister

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, but we had to return because the sizes run small. We ended up losing the discount we got during the original sale, but did get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: My wife is very satisfied with her jacket
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very satisfied with her jacket. Columbia makes terrific outdoor gear. windproof, waterproof. No need to worry what the weather will bring, just take this jacket along...plus it will coordinate with everything in your closet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sanchez II

customer_reviews.title: I like the color and for the price I am happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my North Face jacket that mistakenly got thrown away. I like the color and for the price I am happy enough. I bought based on the measurement guidelines and I had to return it for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. I have a 38 ddd chest so ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. I have a 38 ddd chest so it is (xl) very tight in the breast area. I should have known to go up a size, but it still fits.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good. I purchased this for my early teen daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good. I purchased this for my early teen daughter who saw it on amazon and had to to have it. It is a soft shell exterior, but doesn't have that plastic feel. The size did run a little larger than expected, but is ok for a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves this jacket, does well as a windbreaker ...
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves this jacket, does well as a windbreaker, not too much to warm you up but protects you from the breeze. Stays relatively waterproof in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Nhan

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight jacket. Medium Is roomy and a bit long in in the sleeves (I am 5'2", but busty.) However,I bought it I order to layer, which I don't think I could do with a small. The foxglove color is pretty. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight Alternative to a Sweater & Sheds Light Rain/Mist as Well
customer_reviews.text: Just what my wife wanted. It is form fitting, yet functional. It sheds water in a light rain and is light weight without looking bulky.
customer_reviews.author: amazon-paradox

customer_reviews.title: Love this Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Best jacket I've ever purchased. Fits slightly bigger than true size. I normally need a large to fit properly over my breasts. I purchased this in a medium after trying on my daughters small and it fit.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I wear a M and ordered XS
customer_reviews.text: Runs very big, I ordered two sizes smaller and it fits well, I can still put a sweater or fleece vest under it too. Wonderful addition to my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket! I am 5'2'' and 105 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! I am 5'2'' and 105 lbs. I ordered an XS and it fit well - just large enough to wear a sweatshirt or something under the jacket as well. The jacket shape isn't too boxy which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Pozuc

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket. Weather has been too warm to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. Weather has been too warm to wear it, but think it will be great. I was glad I read the reviews- almost got the medium, but the small fits with a long sleeved shirt and light weight hoodie. (Tried it on with both). Happy wit.h the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: iowa shopper

customer_reviews.title: Washes easy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Nice basic warm jacket. Washed in load with regular darks with no special treatment with no shrinkage, warping or other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect! I ordered a size Large and am 5'8" tall and weigh 160 lbs. Sleeves plenty long and a beautiful color pink!
customer_reviews.author: YooperGirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying twice.
customer_reviews.text: Columbia produced yet another trusty product. I've purchased this jacket twice after I lost my first and was devastated. It was worth it to purchase again. Comfortable, stylish, and sleek: an excellent, lightweight jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Beach

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket but I bought the size I normally buy and should have gotten size smaller. I usually have problems with sleeves being long enough but not with this jacket. They are plenty long.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McNaughton

customer_reviews.title: All-in-all I'm very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the fit, look and feel thus far. Though she's not had it outside yet -- winter has been too cold -- it appears comparable to the North Face version (but cheaper, of course). Also, the fabric is a bit less stiff than the North Face version. All-in-all I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice mid weight jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice mid weight jacket. Jacket fits well across shoulders and is a good length. The sleeves are long but otherwise no complaints. I ordered a medium. I'm 5'4" and 150 and typically wear an 8 or 10 in shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Usually a size small in tops but had to exchange it for an XS. Color is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yamaguchi

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other columbia jackets
customer_reviews.text: Decent product I guess, but not as good of quality or fit as previous versions of this jacket. The sleeves were very large, but short. The body is large, except narrow at the hips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go-to jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, jacket fits well and is exactly what I wanted! Keeps you very warm and doesn't let wind cut through the jacket because of the outside shell, but it's not big and bulky. Casual yet nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Flitted and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I could not love this jacket more. It’s fitted and flattering and is water and wind proof.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for spring/fall seasons only
customer_reviews.text: Thin but a great coat, should be used as a top layer or spring/fall coat only as it doesn't have an inner layer to keep you warm
customer_reviews.author: esalomo

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves are LONG!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this jacket. Fit well through the body but the arms are unusually long. If anything, I have long arms, but these were a good two inches too long on me. Too bad, because it would have been a great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Merentz

customer_reviews.title: Color description is off
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is nice. However, deep rust is really deep crimson or I was sent the wrong color by mistake.
customer_reviews.author: heather roath

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I expected the jacket to be gray tone, which is was more brown tone.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this zip-up
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are a little long for me, but other than that, I love this zip-up. It's water proof, it breathes and it's just warm enough without me getting overheated. I can wear it when riding my horses and not have to stop riding to put on or peel off layers! With it being waterproof, it even repels horse slobber. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had several jackets like this while I was in Afghanistan and they have serve me very well. This one, I bought this jacket for my wife. We originally were going to buy it from Kohl's however Amazon had it for half the price. Amazon Prime got it to us in two days and my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ric De Palm

customer_reviews.title: My go to jacket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light weight jacket that repels rain as well! 2 years later and it’s still my go to jacket, fits great and is still in good condition! Holds up well after washing!
customer_reviews.author: katybean

customer_reviews.title: Columbia Kruger Softshell
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love,Love these Kruger jackets! Warmth without the bulk! Flattering fit!
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I order this because my BFF has it and I love it. Hers is large and fits tight on me specially on my arms. I ordered an x-large and it's way bigger than the large. I decided to stay with the bigger one so I can move easily with it specially when driving, but the large looks better fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I found the large to be loose in the waist ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the large to be loose in the waist but snug at my hips. The sleeves are too long for me. I'm 5'4". And a size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Sandyr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Classy and comfortable! I am very happy with this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket so much. It fits perfectly and is so comfortable. It's keeps me warm on these fall days when I go outside with my daughter. I may have to get another!
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves are a bit long and waste is a bit wide
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves are a bit long and waste is a bit wide. This is typical for me as I am always in between a size medium and large.
customer_reviews.author: kchris

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, but the medium is slightly small threw ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, but the medium is slightly small threw the chest. I am 38 inches and it is too snug. The other measurements are well sized.
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA

customer_reviews.title: Casual and Warm Jacket; No Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is exactly what I wanted. It's a casual-fit that is surprisingly warm. Every now and then I do wish I had gotten the one with the hoodie, though. However, I'm really pleased with this style and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Whitlow

customer_reviews.title: perfect for fall winter spring in moderate climates
customer_reviews.text: Quality and comfort, perfect for fall winter spring in moderate climates. If you buy a size with enough room, this jacket layered over a sweater is pretty warm in the winter even. (30-40 degrees)
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: For cold weather...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lightweight coat which this isn't. It's really well made but the sleeves are way too long. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Beck

customer_reviews.title: I like this. -1 star because its actually a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this. -1 star because its actually a little big for a small, but now I'll be able to layer I guess :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact it is longer so it goes over ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it for riding. I like the fact it is longer so it goes over my belt but not too long to interfere with the saddle.
customer_reviews.author: OC Gal

customer_reviews.title: nice light layer
customer_reviews.text: Great, light layer. Somewhat waterproof. The arms are a little long but I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this rain coat
customer_reviews.text: I love Colombia brand! Fits good and I love the magenta. Good for rain and cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lala

customer_reviews.title: Not fitted but warm and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, warm jacket. Fits boxy on me, but it’s ok because it’s just worn for work over my scrubs. For a fitted jacket, go for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Overall great jacket, exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and expected. I ordered one and the squeeze tie at the bottom was broken. The seller shipped me a new one right away and emailed a label for the return of the broken item. Overall great jacket, exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Padron

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! The fit is flattering & color is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: too large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered S for my wife but it fits like M or L,but nice colour and perfect material so I sold to my friend and she love it
customer_reviews.author: Michal.lyson

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel and look
customer_reviews.text: Except for very long sleeves, the jacket fits well. Nice feel and look.
customer_reviews.author: Topping the State

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Kruser Ridge(TM) Softshell Jacket
product_meta.description: With plenty of stretch mobility, wind blocking capability, and high energy breathability, the Kruger ridge soft-shell takes on the elements as a stand-alone weather master.
feature_bullets: Zip-front jacket with standing collar and logo at chest
Zippered hand pockets. Drawcord adjustable hem
